Question
========

In a sample with size n = 60, the sample mean has a \standard error that is larger than that in a sample with size n
= 180. How many times larger?

Answerlist
----------

* 9 times
* 3 times √3 times

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 9 times: Incorrect
* 3 times: Incorrect √3 times: Correct
